XenotypeDef.label: orc
XenotypeDef.description: A near human race most often seen among goblinoids, the only differences from humans on the surface are the two small tusks protruding from their mouths and that they're usually of a similar green to the various goblinoids. They are however a good bit stronger than a baseline human, being physically larger they do more damage while taking less, and have an aptitude for melee combat They are relatively rare compared to other races in general.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: A near human race most often seen among goblinoids, the only differences from humans on the surface are the two small tusks protruding from their mouths and that they're usually of a similar green to the various goblinoids.
